course.title: CSI 4139 Design of Secure Computer Systems (3 units)
course.desc: Security policies. Security mechanisms. Physical security. Security awareness. User authentication. Application security mechanisms. Encryption. External and internal firewalls. Security of operating systems and software. Security of e-commerce applications. Design of security system and components. Devices for security analysis; sniffers, attack detectors. Information warfare. Ethical issues in computer security.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, Tutorial
